author: China Insights
description:
After he was gone, the entertainment industry was never calm again. A film’s “red-line code” set the whole internet on edge; a “17-person list” tore open the darkest curtain inside the circle. Some were blacklisted, some went silent, some collapsed. But in Paris—on a long bench at the Louvre—the name “YU MENGLONG” is engraved. That is the light kindled by millions of fans, and the last gentleness he left to this world. Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and hit the bell.
Welcome to China Insights — your window into the real China, beyond the veil.
With sharp analysis and a touch of dry humor, we dive into the social unrest, economic crises, censorship, faith suppression, and human rights challenges shaping China today.
We spotlight authentic Chinese culture, deliver timely and uncensored news, break down key economic trends, and explore shifting social dynamics — all while exposing the Chinese Communist Party’s complex roles both at home and on the global stage.
Stay tuned for viral t
title: After Yu Menglong: A Storm of Reckoning
